page.title: 19ATTITUDES
page.content: Most of the people we spoke to liked living in the country. They liked the freedom, the space around them and they liked the peace. One lady we met was not at all happy. She had a very comfortable bungalow with a beautiful garden in a secluded trust estate. But she did not drive, and she was half a mile from the bus stop. She liked the walk but she hated having to wait for the bus and all the time that she had to waste.She also found it very lonely in the winter. Since we originally spoke to her ,she has moved to Hove and says she has never been happier in her life.
